::Rex/Grimmler::

Rex nods. "Firearm drove off to help some Maximals at the Predacon base. You 
could go help him."

Rex turns his head as Grimmler walks up, rubbing his head. "Ugh, what 
happened there?" Grimmler asks dizzily.

"You got beat up," Rex says calmly, Grimmler growling at him. The damaged 
Maximal pushes past the others, walking toward the CR chambers.
